Title: Prohibits the manufacture, sale, and use of cookware containing polytetrafluoroethylene
Summary: Prohibits the manufacture, sale, and use of cookware containing polytetrafluoroethylene.
LawCode: Add Art 37 Title 11 §§37-1101 - 37-1104, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the manufacture, sale, and use of cookware containing polytetrafluoroethylene
